title: Join the Team
subtitle: We are looking for exceptional talent to build the future of healthcare.

header.title: Built for the Obsessed.
header.quote: "We aren't building a company. We are building the undisputed gold standard for healthcare AI. If you want balance, look elsewhere. If you want a legacy, stay."
header.standardText2: . At our current stage, we are not looking for employees. We are looking for pilots.
header.standardText3: This is a high-stakes, high-intensity environment. We work late, we think fast, and we push beyond our limits to find out what it takes to be the best in the world.
header.standardText4: The growth is vertical. The upside is massive. The work is hardcore.
header.disclaimer: * By applying, you acknowledge that you are ready to work harder than you ever have.

select.wildcardDescription: Don't fit into a standard box? Prove you have the multidisciplinary skills to reshape the future. This path is for the exceptional.

identity.title: Identity
identity.subtitle: Basic logistics. Ensure your contact details are perfect.

hustle.title: The Hustle
hustle.subtitle: Prove you belong in a high-intensity environment. No corporate fluff.

gate.title: The Gate
gate.subtitle: This is where 99% of applicants drop off. Show us your work, not your resume.
gate.tip: Tip: Keep it under 2 minutes. Be raw. Be real.
gate.dropfiles: Drop files here or click to upload

about.label: Tell us about yourself
about.placeholder: Briefly describe your background and why you want to join us...

frontend.hustlePlaceholder: Link to your most complex GitHub repo or a live project where you solved a difficult UI/UX challenge. Explain the challenge.
frontend.goalsPlaceholder: What is a UI detail that drives you crazy on most websites? How would you fix it?

ai.hustlePlaceholder: Describe a time you optimized an inference pipeline, designed a novel agentic workflow, or hacked a model to do something unexpected.
ai.goalsPlaceholder: What is the biggest bottleneck in current LLM applications, and how do we solve it?

marketing.hustlePlaceholder: Show us a campaign you ran that generated real ROI. Numbers speak louder than words. What was your strategy?
marketing.goalsPlaceholder: Which B2B brand do you admire most right now and why? What are they doing that others aren't?

sales.hustlePlaceholder: What's the hardest deal you've ever closed? Walk us through the negotiation and how you won.
sales.goalsPlaceholder: How do you cut through the noise when prospecting high-value medical directors?
sales.gateLabel: Loom Video: Sell us a Pen

default.hustlePlaceholder: What is the most impressive thing you've built, achieved, or solved? (Don't be modest)
default.goalsPlaceholder: What specific problem do you want to solve at Curify?

messages.successText: We really hope you are the one. We will reach back to you.
messages.disclaimer: This is a permanent entry into the Curify talent pool.
